settings.heading: What is Master Resell Rights (MRR)?
settings.row_content: Master Resell Rights means you own this course outright. Once purchased, you can resell it for 100% profit. You also leverage all the materials to scale your marketing and business efforts.

settings.heading: Do I need prior experience?
settings.row_content: No! This course is designed for people with ZERO digital marketing or business knowledge. We guide you every step of the way.

settings.heading: Are there hidden fees or subscriptions?
settings.row_content: Nope. This one-time investment gives you everything you need to launch and grow.

settings.heading: What if I don‚Äôt want to sell the course?
settings.row_content: That‚Äôs fine, too! You can use the skills taught in this course to grow any passion or business idea in any niche.

settings.heading: What if I have questions or feel stuck?
settings.row_content: We‚Äôve got you covered! The DWA community supports over 80,000 entrepreneurs worldwide. Join live Q&A sessions or connect one-on-one with mentors for personalized help.

settings.heading: Will I get updates on the course?
settings.row_content: Absolutely! All users receive lifetime access to any updates or new modules added‚Äîat no extra cost.
